meanings.definition: Surgical removal of plaque from the inner lining of an artery.
meanings.sent1: The endarterectomies successfully cleared the blockage in the artery.
meanings.sent2: Doctors performed multiple endarterectomies to improve blood flow.
meanings.sent3: The endarterectomies danced out of the artery, leaving it clean and clear.
meanings.sent4: The endarterectomies were like skilled cleaners, scrubbing the artery walls.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the endarterectomies was like watching a tiny army fighting plaque.
